addr: 1000 N Alameda St Los Angeles, CA 90012
title: 2016 Statewide Pro Bono Conference
desc: OneJustice invites you to attend the 2016 Statewide Pro Bono Conference! This event brings together all stakeholders within the California pro bono community - including law firms, in-house counsel, legal services nonprofits, law schools, bar associations, and courts - to work collaboratively towards solving the legal needs of California's underserved. CANCELLATION POLICY Full refund of registration fees will be issued to those provide written notice of cancellation, via email to mwinn@one-justice.org, by January 14, 2016.
